Articles.Content: I keep trying to play this game but I can never log back in because my email is wrong?

I keep trying to play this game but I can never log back in because my email is wrong?

Telling you that the e-mail you entered doesn't exist, and there's no password recovery screen, ah?

You may have to e-mail admin Sheepy, at mailto:[email protected], or catch him on the forums

So how about that Konstitutional Konvention?

We still have 3 votes left unaccounted for - vger's and Nick's, and huehuehue who still hasn't signed up.
Yeah, that's a problem. I'll have to close the poll soon or the convention is not going anywhere.
Just tossed in my two cents... or Kerbits... whatever they're called.
After the ballots, Jidithrambus is chosen as leader of the convention (or convention) and is promoted to moderator rank in the forum.

Huzzah! Thanks to everyone who voted Ã¢â‚¬â€ and next comes the formulation of the Konstitution. I've posted to the Konvention thread. Around what timeframes will you all be most available for the drafting in of the Konstitution, and voting people into newly created positions?

With Genebree MIA for 25 days now, we should indeed form a new alliance, as well. Would you all be interested in a new name?
The price of steel has gone down about 1,500 in the past week
Truth. Driving the price down by selling low to alliance members...

Or just being that guy buying tons at $1 each to drive the price down. Also, it went down almost 800 dollars in 12 hours. I tried selling some at 7am at 2400 each, and now they are 1800 each. Perhaps speculate about it and buy a lot when it is down really low.
Ah, true... dagnab that guy Big Johnson. Indeed, it's a good buying time
Designer, or MGUARN, may I be promoted to Officer for the time being?
yes you shall be promoted for the meantime for crew officer.

Anyone who can, please get online, especially MGUARN and Kenneth. We have a situation that must be resolved within the day. If it's not, I'm going to go ahead and proceed with a course of action already recommended.
The clock has struck midnight on the server, and I have not received any more input on the issue. I will proceed with the recommended course of action.

I have been playing Politics and War for the past few weeks. It's not as fulfilling as Civ or pretending you lead a nation of Kerbals in KSP, but it's still fun. My nation is called Tyupik.

Somebody left me in charge of my small alliance a week after I started playing. 

 

Edited November 3, 2016 by astrokerb
